abstract: Videos have begun to surface of oil leaking from the cargo ship Rena, which ran aground last week off the coast of New Zealand, as it makes landfall on nearby beaches.
snippet: Videos have begun to surface of oil leaking from the cargo ship Rena, which ran aground last week off the coast of New Zealand, as it makes landfall on nearby beaches.
lead_paragraph: Videos of the cargo ship that became stuck on a reef off the coast of New Zealand a week ago were broadcast almost immediately, as the ship began spilling oil and debris. Now more have begun to surface, documenting the sludge-covered beaches as the leaked oil makes landfall.

headline.main: Spilled Oil Makes Landfall After New Zealand Cargo Ship Accident
